subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Tottenham midfielder Gylfi Sigurdsson is from the island nation of about 320,000 people that has sent an outsize number of quality players to top clubs in Europe and Scandinavia.
snippet: Tottenham midfielder Gylfi Sigurdsson is from the island nation of about 320,000 people that has sent an outsize number of quality players to top clubs in Europe and Scandinavia.
